title: Ivan Ivanchenko
text:
Ivan Dmitriyevich Ivanchenko (; born 7 September 1998) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> for <a href="FC%20Amkar%20Perm">FC Amkar Perm</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Lada-Togliatti">FC Lada-Togliatti</a> on 3 September 2015 in a game against <a href="FC%20Volga%20Ulyanovsk">FC Volga Ulyanovsk</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Anzhi%20Makhachkala">FC Anzhi Makhachkala</a> on 26 November 2017 in a game against <a href="FC%20Rostov">FC Rostov</a>.
